member.name: T:R5T.T0143.DraftMarkerAttributeMarkerAttribute
member.summary: Marks an attribute as being a draft marker attribute. (Used for marking attributes as marker attributes. Draft marker attributes are quickly created marker attributes that should be reviewed and relocated, and thus become marker attributes.) The marker attribute is useful for surveying assemblies and code, then building a catalogue of draft marker attributes as a kind of TODO list.

member.name: P:R5T.T0143.DraftMarkerAttributeMarkerAttribute.IsMarkerAttribute
member.summary: Allows specifying that a type is *not* a marker attribute. This is useful for marking types that end up canonical marker attribute code file locations, but are not actually marker attributes.

member.name: T:R5T.T0143.MarkerAttributeMarkerAttribute
member.summary: Marks an attribute as being a marker attribute. (Used for marking attributes as marker attributes.) The marker attribute is useful for surveying assemblies and code, then building a catalogue of marker attributes.

member.name: P:R5T.T0143.MarkerAttributeMarkerAttribute.IsMarkerAttribute
member.summary: Allows specifying that a type is *not* a marker attribute. This is useful for marking types that end up canonical marker attribute code file locations, but are not actually marker attributes.

member.name: T:R5T.T0143.Documentation
member.summary: Marker attribute and interface for marker attributes and interfaces.

member.name: T:R5T.T0143.IDraftMarkerAttributeMarker
member.summary: Marker interface for types that are draft marker attributes. Allows methods-for, and extension methods-on, all types that are draft marker attributes. Note: while it might be rare to actually see an instance of an attribute type, this interface is provided for consistency.

member.name: T:R5T.T0143.IMarkerAttributeMarker
member.summary: Marker interface for types that are marker attributes. Allows methods-for, and extension methods-on, all types that are marker attributes. Note: while it might be rare to actually see an instance of an attribute type, this interface is provided for consistency.
